alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Chambers; Elmore; Lee; Macon; Montgomery; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Elmore, Lee, northern Bullock, Macon, southern Tallapoosa, southern Chambers and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wetumpka to near Liberty City to near Waverly to near Bleecker. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Auburn, Opelika, Tuskegee, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Notasulga, Smiths, Milstead, Pike Road, Smiths Station, La Fayette, Eclectic, Shorter, Franklin, Waverly, Cusseta and Martin Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bullock; Chambers; Elmore; Lee; Macon; Montgomery; Tallapoosa
